Title: New books arrive in the mountain village
Publisher: Guangxi renmin chubanshe (广西人民出版社)
Notes: The woman center front holds an edition of Lenin's The State and Revolution (国家与革命).Among the posters for sale in the background are Old Party Secretary, Spring hoeing (by Huxian peasant painters) and An impregnable bulwark on the grasslands.
Theme: To Read Too Many Books is Harmful
